meanings: (몸이) (상처 등이) painful, sore, (병으로) sick, ill, (동사로 쓰여) hurt, ache
have a pain in the stomach
have a pain in the ear

vlive.korean: 목 아프다 - 거북목 있으시죠? "My neck hurts!" - You have turtle neck, right? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: "My neck hurts!" - You have turtle neck, right?

vlive.korean: '머리 아프다' 여기? "Headache," this part? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 49: SPECIAL GUEST 🦊
맞아요 '머리 아프다' - 진짜요? I know! "headache"! - Really? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : STAY! 우리두 해피 뉴 이어!!!!!!!

vlive.english: It hurts. - Should I use four?

vlive.korean: "이 노래 뭐야? 머리 아프다?" - "머리 아프다?" "What is this song? Head hurts"? - "Head hurts"? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 빨리 돌아와 주길 "바람"✨
vlive.english: "What is this song? Head hurts"? - "Head hurts"?

examples.korean: He gets the occasional niggle in his right shoulder. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 간간이 오른쪽 어깨가 약간 아프다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She is gravely ill. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 심각하게 아프다[병세가 위중하다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
